metadata.title: CVE-2020-9948 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
A type confusion issue was addressed with improved memory handling. Thisissue is fixed in Safari 14.0. Processing maliciously crafted web contentmay lead to arbitrary code execution.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-9948` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

gir1.2-javascriptcoregtk-4.0 - 2.30.3-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
gir1.2-webkit2-4.0 - 2.30.3-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
libjavascriptcoregtk-4.0-18 - 2.30.3-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
libjavascriptcoregtk-4.0-bin - 2.30.3-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
libwebkit2gtk-4.0-37 - 2.30.3-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
libwebkit2gtk-4.0-37-gtk2 - 2.30.3-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
webkit2gtk-driver - 2.30.3-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: webkitgtk package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
webkit2gtk package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.30.3-0ubuntu0.18.04.1').
qtwebkit-source package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
qtwebkit-opensource-src package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
